definition: of very poor quality, rock music with deliberately offensive lyrics expressing anger and social alienation
details:
adjective
- of very poor quality
= synonyms: cheap
noun
- rock music with deliberately offensive lyrics expressing anger and social alienation
= synonyms: punk rock
- an aggressive and violent young criminal
= synonyms: hood
- a teenager or young adult who is a performer (or enthusiast) of punk rock and a member of the punk youth subculture
= synonyms: punk rocker
- material for starting a fire
= synonyms: kindling
- substance that smolders when ignited
